turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I need to place an order at Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Certiantly sir, which Starbucks will it be?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I need to pick this up at the Streamwood location.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes sir, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to order cafe mocha please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Of course, what size?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: What sizes are there?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You can order between Short, Tall, Grande or Venti.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ok, I will order a tall.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like milk?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, but I want Almond milk if available.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes, they have an Almond milk option.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you want any whipped cream on on it?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: How many calories does whipped cream add?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: If you get whipped cream it will add seventy more calories.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Oh ok, I will have it with no whipped cream.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Very well, at what time will you pick this up?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like it ready in thirty minutes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Of course, it will be ready at 7:20pm.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you for your help.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem, is that all for your order.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, that is all, thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You are welcome.
